content.title: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.
content.author: Dhammapada, Verse 1 (trans. K.R. Norman, 1997)
content.quote_text: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.

generation.prompt: J.M.W. Turner style atmospheric luminism with golden light dissolving and emerging from forms, soft focus throughout composition, luminous passages where paint itself seems to glow, forms suggested rather than defined by light, atmospheric perspective creating infinite depth. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
